snippet.title: Bit of War Gameplay
snippet.description:
Video showing the first level in Bit of War, to give an idea of its gameplay and look.
This a very good plateformer based on an 8 bit interpretation of the series God of War. Simple control, challenging, Kratos in pixel art and it's fun to play.

Bit of War is a Free indie game available for Windows. You can grab it here http://www.holmadegames.com/bitofwar.html and don't forget to share your pics and tricks with us at http://gameboom.net/games/bit-of-war
